item.Q:
Write the character:
to express; disclose; enlighten; open
item.A:
阐 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 闡
chǎn
阐明 (闡明) chǎnmíng clarify; explain clearly

幽 (strokes unavailable)
yōu
幽默 yōumò humor; humorous

扩 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 擴
kuò
扩大 (擴大) kuòdà to expand; to enlarge; to broaden one's scope

item.Q:

dirty; filthy; foul; corrupt; to smear; to defile; dirt; filth
item.A:
wū
污染 wūrǎn pollution

彰 (strokes unavailable)
zhāng
表彰 biǎozhāng cite (in dispatches); commend

xiáng

traditional: 闡明
chǎnmíng clarify; explain clearly

traditional: 闡述
chǎnshù to expound (a position); to elaborate (on a topic); to treat (a subject)
Yōuzhōu Fanyang (ancient city in Northern China)
yōuàn gloom
yōushēn serene and hidden in depth or distance

traditional: 幽靈
yōulíng specter; apparition; ghost

traditional: 幽靜
yōujìng (adj) remote; secluded; (adj) hidden place; difficult to find
yōumò humor; humorous

traditional: 擴充
kuòchōng to expand

traditional: 擴大
kuòdà to expand; to enlarge; to broaden one's scope

traditional: 擴展
kuòzhǎn extend; expand

traditional: 擴建
kuòjiàn to extend a building

traditional: 擴張
kuòzhāng expansion; dilation; to expand (e.g. one's power or influence); to broaden

traditional: 擴散
kuòsàn spread; proliferation; diffusion

traditional: 擴音器
kuòyīnqì megaphone; microphone
wūrǎn pollution
wūshuǐ sewage
yóuwū oil pollution

traditional: 環境污染
huánjìngwūrǎn environmental pollution
biǎozhāng cite (in dispatches); commend

háobù hardly; not in the least; not at all
háobú hardly
háokè milligram
háoshēng milliliter
háobā millibar (mbar or mb), unit of pressure (equal to hecto-Pascal)
háowēimǐ millicron

traditional: 毫無
háowú without

traditional: 毫無疑問
háowúyíwèn certainty; without a doubt
háomǐ millimeter

traditional: 絲毫
sīháo the slightest amount or degree; a bit
bùxiáng ominous; inauspicious
jíxiáng lucky
cíxiáng kindly; benevolent (often of older person)

traditional: 強盜
qiángdào to rob (with force); bandit; robber

traditional: 海盜
hǎidào pirate

traditional: 海盜行為
hǎidàoxíngwéi piracy

traditional: 罰款
fákuǎn (impose a) fine; penalty; fine (monetary)

traditional: 罰球
fáqiú penalty shot; penalty kick (in sports)

traditional: 罰金
fájīn fine; to forfeit

traditional: 處罰
chǔfá penalize; punish

traditional: 賞罰
shǎngfá reward and punishment

traditional: 體罰
tǐfá corporal punishment
fānyīfān to think a little
jiāndāo dagger
jiānzi best of its kind; cream of the crop
jiānduān sharp pointed end; the tip; the cusp; tip-top; most advanced and sophisticated; highest peak; the best

traditional: 尖頂
jiāndǐng steeple

traditional: 尖頭
jiāntóu acumination

traditional: 筆尖
bǐjiān nib; pen point; the tip of a writing brush or pencil

traditional: 頂尖
dǐngjiān peak; world best; number one; finest (competitors); apex; peak; top (figures in a certain field)

traditional: 灰塵
huīchén dust
huīxīn lose heart; be discouraged
huībái colored; ash-colored
huīsè gray; grizzly

traditional: 煙灰
yānhuī (n); cigarette ash
shēngshíhuī calx
shíhuī lime
shíhuīshuǐ limewater
shíhuīshí limestone
gǔhuī bone ash; ashes of the dead
